RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: danoise [bjorn.nesby@googlemail.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Duplex Browser
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Main userinterface for Duplex, the official Renoise scripting API for working with OSC & MIDI controller devices. The Duplex browser allows you to select applications (Mixer, Matrix, Effect...) and run them on supported devices. Creates a new menu 'Duplex' in the global 'Tools' menu.
